https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/s3APcb6W1pxxElfdy0jJXiYph7Y.jpg At 76, Swedish auteur Roy Andersson is about to complete his last film. With the end of his career in sight, the central thematic concerns of Roy's work - vulnerability, insecurity and mortality - spill over into his creative process. Being a Human Person
